data.description:
January 16, 2024: The Meta Quest 3 Update for The Walking Dead: Saints & Sinners is live! Meta Quest 3 players will find in the update:

- Increased walker count (up to 100% more walkers)
- Better materials, shades, reflections, post-processing effects
- Increased texture resolution and level of detail
- New dynamic light sources and shadows
- Additional layers of dirt, grime, and other texture overlays
- Dynamic shadows added to the flashlight to increase impact of dark maps
- Increased bloom, lighting, fire, and fog fidelity
- And much more!

Face all the horrors that the living and the dead can offer in this new VR adventure in The Walking Dead universe. Travel through the ruins of walker infested New Orleans as you fight, sneak, scavenge, and survive each day unraveling a city wide mystery within the iconic quarters. Encounter desperate factions and lone survivors who could be friend or foe. Whether you help others or take what you want by force, every choice you make has consequences. What kind of survivor will you be for the people of NOLA? 
 
Scavenge for anything that you can weapons, food, tools, and clues.
 
Be wary of the living and the dead: spatial audio will draw attention to any loud noise, bullets or otherwise.
 
Craft makeshift gear out of scrapped material blades, guns, medicine, and more.
 
Survive your way: Use stealth or fight head on. Scavenge or complete jobs for others.
 
Test your morals: make difficult choices for yourself and others.

changelog.change_log:
Patch Notes for all systems - 10/13/2021
Improvements and fixes arrive, just in time for the Oculus Anniversary Sale!

We've fixed major progress blockers and other inconveniences, but if you still have issues you need addressed, please continue to reach out to us on our Discord: https://discord.gg/skydanceinteractive 

Additions/Improvements
-- Quickstart for Aftershocks is now available! It allows direct access to the free Aftershocks post-game content.
-- Vive Controls for the UV Flashlight has been updated: the player can now double tap “down” on either trackpad to activate the UV Flashlight

Bug Fixes
-- Fixed an issue where the radio could stutter or play the incorrect lines when first starting the Aftershocks content from a post-game save
-- Fixed an issue where if the player never picked up a key for Aftershocks and left the map, it would not respawn
-- Distant gun fire should no longer sound like it’s in the player’s ear
-- Impact sounds should play again
-- Invincible Collapsed Walkers / Toe Piranhas / Demon Logs should now be extinct
-- Player should now be able to exit the credits early
-- Fall Knife Giveaway has ended.  Thank you all for your participation and support!

Aftershocks HOTFIX

While we're working on some additional fixes, we felt this update for Quest was too important to hold.  We wanted any players getting ready to dive into Aftershocks over the weekend to get a more stable experience.  More to come!

In this Update:

Stability improvements
Crash - Fixes boot crash experienced by some users
Crash - Fixes common combat-related crash

Bug Fixes
Progression Blocker - Fixed End of Aftershocks prog blockers some players were experiencing (should work for those currently stuck and any future players)

Hey there Tourists,

The Aftershocks update is finally here, and as such we at Skydance Interactive want to make sure that you have the best experience you can have with it. Today, we would like to reveal one such way we are working to make the experience even better for our players, alongside some news and details that may be relevant to you.

Upcoming Quick Start Feature
While Aftershocks is intended to be played after you have reached the credits, we understand that some players may find themselves without a completed save file and not wanting to play through the entirety of the game again just to see the what's new.

To satisfy these players, we plan to implement a quick start option that will allow you to jump straight into the Aftershocks content without finishing a playthrough. This feature will be implemented in a patch following shortly after the initial update, so if you do not have a post-game save file yet, you can choose to wait for this feature. 

We thank you again for all your support, and are very excited for you all to enjoy what Aftershocks has to offer.

The Walking Dead: Saints & Sinners - The Trial DLC on Quest
You’ve clubbed, hacked, and shot your way through hundreds of zombies and saved New Orleans — or maybe condemned it. The fight is far from over though, as Skydance Interactive rolls out “The Trial” for The Walking Dead: Saints & Sinners on Oculus Quest.  Score points for surviving each round, then spend those points to accrue an arsenal of weapons. Rinse and repeat—and keep an eye on your ammo.  Check it out on Oculus Quest today!

Release notes for Quest Patch CL 187992
* Fixes for several cases of blocked progression during Radio conversations.
* Improved stability during level loads.
Fixed a sporadic crash that appears when Voice Immersion is enabled.

Additions/Improvements
* Voice Immersion feature now available. Oculus microphone permission setting must be set to "YES".
* Recipes at crafting station have improved resolution
* Bobble head on bus has improved resolution
Bug Fixes
* Progression Break - Players embarking on the When The Levee Breaks or Kindness of Strangers tasks were unable to progress.
* Reflective textures should no longer turn black when loading into a map

Quest Patch Release Notes (10/23/2020)

Additions/Improvements

* Adjusted the blood fx on arms
* Lighting Pass on all maps
* Performance improvements around the Bus
* VFX resolution pass

Bug Fixes

* Progression Break - Walking away or sleeping during a conversation with "the Man on the radio" prevents the story from progressing. (Unfortunately, it could not be a retroactive fix, but should no longer come up during progression in new save files)
* Added the missing door knobs back to their doors in Bywater and The Ward
* Adjusted Radio Volumes
* Axe should always appear as a back-up, during the Finale
* Character Textures Fixes
* Miscellaneous Environment Geometry fixes
* Projectile collision at Finale battle fixed
* Reflective textures should no longer turn black when loading into a map
* Skydome Texture Fixes 
* Overwriting a previous save profile should no longer cause audio to temporarily muted
